A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi has killed the whole Star Wars series for me from here on out.  The plot is full of holes\, lame attempts at humor\, and is yet another one time great thing ruined by political correctness/SJW nonsense messaging.  Really sad flick\, and a waste of my money and time.  A bad end (for me) to a series that began as a really uplifting and fun series of stories.
